03_central_limit_theorem/01_standard_normal/09_z_from_twotail_area_v1

Determine \(z\) such that \(P(|Z|>z)=0.6\). In other words, how far from 0 should boundaries be set such that 60% of standard normal values are outside those boundaries? (Answers within 0.01 from the correct value will be marked correct.)
